睼字的基本解释

睼
tí
视：“弦不睼兽，辔不诡遇。”
远望。

睼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tiàn］
［《廣韻》他甸切，去霰，透。］
迎视；观看。

睼字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　睼； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页812第43
【唐韻】【集韻】?他計切，音剃。【說文】迎視也。【班固·東都賦】弦不睼禽。【張衡·思?賦】親所睼而弗識。　又【集韻】【韻會】?田黎切，音題。義同。又遠視也。又坐見也。或作睇。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?他甸切，天去聲。視也。與䀖瞋?同。　【㴑原】或作?。

睼字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
睼字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
睼
tí
See: "The string is not a beast, and the bridle is not a strange encounter."
Looking far away.
睼
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tiàn］
["Guangyun" he cuts hard, goes to the chase, and thoroughly. ]
Greet; watch.
睼
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Headword Department] 　睼; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 812 43
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? He planned to cut, and the sound was shaved. [Said the text] Ying Shi also. [Ban Gu·Dong Du Fu] The string is not the bird. [Zhang Heng·Si? Fu] You know what you are familiar with, but you are not aware of it.　[Jiyun] [Rhyme]? Tian Liqie, phonetic title. The same meaning. Also farsighted. See you again. Or make a look.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] again? He cut sharply, and the sky is gone. See also. Same as stubborn?　【㴑原】or for?.
